name: Snowboard Race
overview: A single player snowboarding sports game published in Magic Disk 64 1988/08, and then in Digital Marketing PD #098, and also in 64'er Spielesammlung #6. If you miss a goal, you will not be disqualified, but will be added 20 seconds to your time. The great thing about 'Snowboard Race' is that you are not alone on the slope, but you are racing against the computer. So be quick if you want to be in the top ten! Snowboard safe!"
